section.45: Chapters on The Virtues of the Qur'an

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Abdullah bin 'Amr:that the Prophet (ï·º) said: "It shall be said - meaning to the one who memorized the Qur'an - 'Recite, and rise up, recite (melodiously) as you would recite in the world. For indeed your rank shall be at the last Ayah you recited
